deltas.description: Add requirement: The system SHALL provide a Google Maps based interface showing venue locations using custom markers.

requirement.text: The system SHALL provide a Google Maps based interface showing venue locations using custom markers.

scenarios.rawText:
- **GIVEN** the user is on the Discovery screen
- **WHEN** the Map view mode is active
- **THEN** a Google Map SHALL be rendered
- **AND** it SHALL display markers representing venues within the current viewport.

deltas.description: Add requirement: The system SHALL allow users to switch between a map view and a list view seamlessly.

requirement.text: The system SHALL allow users to switch between a map view and a list view seamlessly.

scenarios.rawText:
- **GIVEN** the user is in Map view
- **WHEN** the user taps the view toggle button
- **THEN** the Map view SHALL be replaced by a scrollable List view of venues
- **AND** the toggle UI SHALL update to reflect the new state.

deltas.description: Add requirement: The system SHALL provide a search bar to filter venues by name or category.

requirement.text: The system SHALL provide a search bar to filter venues by name or category.

scenarios.rawText:

deltas.description: Add requirement: The system SHALL center the map on the user's current location upon request if permissions are granted.
